      • getChi

        public double getChi​(double temperature)
        Description copied from class: MCMove
        Chi is the parameter within standard Metropolis Monte Carlo. The probability of accepting the move is given by min(1,chi).
        Overrides:
        getChi in class MCMoveInsertDelete
        Parameters:
        temperature - used to compute chi
        Returns:
        chi

        Returns:

      • setZFraction

        public void setZFraction​(double zFraction)
        Sets the zFraction, the fraction of the box volume into which atoms are inserted or deleted. The volume is on the far left or right side (in the z dimension). To put the volume on the left side (negative z), specify a negative z fraction (a positive value will result in the volume being on the positive z side.
